Two people were killed in separate accidents within 24 hours in the city.
A 46-year-old truck driver, Abdul Salem, was killed by a fellow trucker who rammed his truck into him late on Friday outside Jaipur Golder godown in Naurangpur.
An eyewitness, Suresh, told cops that Salem and he were sitting outside the godown when the accused, Ajay, drove his truck towards them and mowed down Salem, killing him on the spot.
